session.system_prompt: You are analyzing a workplace conversation between David (A-player account manager) and Maria (colleague who was supposed to cover a client call) regarding a missed client check-in.

messages.content: You are analyzing a workplace conversation between David (A-player account manager) and Maria (colleague who was supposed to cover a client call) regarding a missed client check-in.
Hey Maria, quick one. I just got an email from Henderson. He said he never got his check-in call yesterday. What happened?

metadata.name: David
metadata.context: A-player account manager, concerned about client complaint, seeking factual information

messages.content: Oh, hey David! Gosh, yesterday was just manic, you wouldn't believe it. The new product launch files are a total mess.

metadata.name: Maria
metadata.context: Colleague who missed the call, immediately deflecting to other issues

messages.content: I heard. But what about the Henderson call? Did you not get a chance to connect?

metadata.name: David
metadata.context: Redirecting conversation back to the specific issue

messages.content: No, I mean, I definitely tried to get a hold of them. I had that slot blocked off for you.

metadata.name: Maria
metadata.context: Claiming she tried while being vague about actual actions

messages.content: Tried? What do you mean? Did you call and it went to voicemail?

metadata.name: David
metadata.context: Pressing for specific details about what 'tried' means

messages.content: You know how that office is, they're always impossible to reach. Honestly, David, I don't know how you manage them. You're so good at handling that account.

metadata.name: Maria
metadata.context: Deflecting blame to client, using flattery to change subject

messages.content: So... you didn't actually speak to anyone?

metadata.name: David
metadata.context: Direct question cutting through the deflection

messages.content: Like I said, that part of the afternoon just got completely buried. I must have just gotten pulled into the fire drill with the launch. Did you hear what Mark from engineering said?

metadata.name: Maria
metadata.context: Still avoiding direct answer, introducing new distraction topic

messages.content: Okay. So you didn't make the call.

metadata.name: David
metadata.context: Making a direct statement based on the evasive responses

messages.content: I didn't say that! I said I tried. It wasn't my fault the whole afternoon exploded. Anyway, it was just a routine check-in, right? No big deal. I can call him right now for you.

metadata.name: Maria
metadata.context: Defensive reaction, minimizing importance, offering to fix now
